title: My phone won't charge properly even after buying a new recharger. The internet on the phone crashes.
content:
I have brought a new recharger, the device does charge but only in a certain position which suggests that the jax within the device needs replacing. 

The internet on the device also often crashes and say oops there seems to be a problem loading that page. 

Finally the speaker on the phone has gone incredibly quite. 

Happy for the phone to be sent off to be repaired.
